name: vpay-platform
description: VPay - Web3 micro-economy platform for instant payments, tasks, and rewards

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:contracts"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:contracts && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:contracts
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.contracts:deploy:local: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.contracts:deploy:testnet: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network sepolia
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules contracts/node_modules shared/node_modules

author: VeryChat Team
